meanings.sent1: The boneheaded decision to wear shorts in the snow left him shivering.
meanings.sent2: It was boneheaded of him to forget his keys inside the locked car.
meanings.sent3: She felt boneheaded when she realized she had been wearing mismatched shoes all day.
meanings.sent4: His boneheaded mistake cost the team the game.
meanings.sent5: The boneheaded move of leaving the umbrella at home resulted in a drenched walk.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of intelligence or good judgment.
meanings.sent1: The boneheaded move of not studying for the test led to a failing grade.
meanings.sent2: It was boneheaded of her to trust a stranger with her personal information.
meanings.sent3: He felt boneheaded when he realized he had been using the calculator in the wrong mode all along.
meanings.sent4: Her boneheaded decision to take a shortcut through the dark alley proved to be a mistake.
meanings.sent5: The boneheaded choice to ignore the warning signs resulted in a dangerous situation.
